pages.title: Blessing Technology
pages.text: You are so close to feeling the touch of our $(item)Gods$(), to make this work you will need the $(item)Blessings$() of both the $(item)Old Gods$() aswell as the $(item)Gods Among the Stars$().$(br2)In their name you will build an $(item)Altar$() constructed from materials bathed in $(item)Starlight$(), aswell as soaked in $(item)Blood$().

pages.title: Blessing Technology
pages.text: Every single component in the $(item)Altar$() must be built out of Holy components. So for this purpose we had to make a special type of casing that the $(item)Gods$() do not frown upon.

pages.title: Altar of Blessings
pages.notes: Don't forget to use $(l:portal_hub/4_schematica)Schematica$() if you're unsure of how to build the multiblock.

pages.title: Blessable Items
pages.notes: This is a list of items that you need to $(item)Bless$() before they can be used to create well functioning, efficient $(item)Machinery$()!$(br2)The altar will only function when the $(item)Spectral Relay$() holds a $(item)Blood Raven Feather$().

pages.text: To see all of the recipes you can make in the $(item)Altar of Blessings$(), check out the uses of the Machine Blueprint$(br)(This item is not required to use the $(item)Altar$())
